summary:
BAMM! is a standalone collection of [color=red]50[/color] none-replacer armours, 27 original meshes & 23 standalone retexture's, that all work with Caliente's amazing BodySlide tool, and stuffed bunny's Bodyslide++ 35 Slider evolution!

Compiled in a single .ESP, graciously assembled at the permission of each armours
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/z8Qnucm.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/8ViZR0J.png[/img]

[color=red]BAMM![/color] is a collection of [color=red]50 [/color]none-replacer armours, 27 original meshes & 23 standalone retexture's, that all work with Caliente's amazing BodySlide tool. Graciously compiled with permission from their respective authors, it is completely standalone, and each armour adheres to CB++'s 35 sliders thanks to ChronoTrigger77.
BAMM! Is [color=yellow]100% script free,[/color] simply a collection of armours, it should drop in (and out) of your game with [b]zero[/b] issues.


[i][u][size=4.5pt]BAMM! Is now on version 1.[color=red]3![/color] Huge Upgrade![/size][/u][/i]
Reduced size, A cleaned up ESP, and amazing BodySlide++ Functionality and Streamlined upgraded options. Further notes at the foot [url=http://cityadspix.com/tsclick-MIQCWPUV-GECAQBFF?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sotmarket.ru%2Fproduct%2Fpartner-night.html&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&bt=20&pt=9<=2&tl=3&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&im=ODI1LTAtMTQzMDA5ODk4OS0xMzgyMDMyMg%3D%3D&fid=NDQ1NzU2Nzc1&prdct=093d0d390d37033502&kw=of%20the]of the[/url] page.
You should completely uninstall previous Bamm installations prior to updating, you will NOT lose any equipped armours!

[u][b][size=6pt]Quick Intro & Installation.[/size][/b][/u] [color=red] Mod is NSFW![/color]

1) REQUIRED - Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888]CHSBHC[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35035]Natural Breast Animation[/url] for BBP animations. Alternatively, you can install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34713]TBBP[/url] if you prefer for enhanced animation.

2) REQUIRED - Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800]XMPS[/url] to get full BBP and TBBP skelenton support.

3) REQUIRED - Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url].

4) OPTIONAL - Install your favorite CBBE Texture mod and use Caliente's Texblend to fix the next seams etc.

5) OPTIONAL - Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and BBP[/url].

6) REQUIRED -Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731]Bodyslide CB Plus Plus - Extra Sliders for CBBE[/url] (Main File).

7) OPTIONAL - Install optional sets from Bodyslide CB Plus Plus.

8) Install BAMM!

9) Run Bodyslide++.exe to customize all these wonderful outfits to your favorite CBBE bodyshape. (\Skyrim\Data\CalienteTools\BodySlide).

10) Come back here and ENDORSE ALL THE FABULOUS OUTFITS on their respective pages.

BodySlide (NOT INCLUDED with BAMM - see install order above) is a simple program that allows you to [color=yellow]100% customise [/color]your body (female only) and lots of armours to proportions of your choosing. I always found it odd to have a small chested girl, equip a new body piece and suddenly grow a large bust, or vice versa.


[u][b]Table of Contents.[/b][/u]

[size=5pt]1. Credits and permissions.
2. Detailed Description
3. FAQ.
4. Recommendations.
5. Bugs, to do, version history and updates.[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/z8Qnucm.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/yuohB9q.png[/img]

By [i]far[/i] the most important section of this description, here you'll find all available links to the creators of these wonderful armour pieces. Listed with prominence in recognition of their work and talent. dwjlien is simply an untalented waiter bringing the cordon bleu dishes these master chefs serve up to your table. I am so thankful to each one of them for enhancing my Skyrim way beyond my wildest expectations.

If you - yes YOU! Even think of looking at BAMMs endorse button without first crediting these guys I will personally come round to your house and speak to your mother in a very suggestive manner that makes you feel really quite uncomfortable indeed. And if you don't live with your mom, then I'll go round hers, and you'll just have to[i] imagine[/i] exactly how I'm pursuing my vengeance... .

[size=5pt][b]PLEASE DOWNLOAD & ENDORSE THESE GUYS! KUDOS THEIR PROFILE PAGES![/b][/size]
Thank you to, in no particular order :

[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showuser=2535456]Lustrianna / Lust Design.[/url]
MIA but she is the very talented creator [url=http://cityadspix.com/tsclick-MIQCWPUV-GECAQBFF?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sotmarket.ru%2Fproduct%2Fpartner-night.html&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&bt=20&pt=9<=2&tl=3&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&im=ODI1LTAtMTQzMDA5ODk4OS0xODk3MjEwMw%3D%3D&fid=NDQ1NzU2Nzc1&prdct=093d0d390d37033502&kw=of%20the]of the[/url] included armours, Adamantine Gear, Tribal Glass, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15804]Dovahkiin Mercenary Gear[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16096]Sovngarde Steel[/url] A personal fave!

His [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28275/?]3D Pubic Hair[/url] Plus [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34366]Silverlight BS settings[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/744716]seta_vn[/url] for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23616]Dark Illusion Armour[/url]
Credit also Silvist, Slash197, Endiness, and SkeletonK I think. Difficult to track!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3196078]Nalim666[/url]for his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12101]Spriggan Armour.[/url] And [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12013] Slick Catsuit[/url]

As well as [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30089]Divine Huntress.[/url] Uploaded by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5767978]ozzking[/url] with credit to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2113195]asianboy345[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4855874/?]themanclaw[/url] for his[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35416/?] See-through Chainmail[/url] As well as an advance preview of his Lace variations!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/597482/?]Merilia[/url] for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6544]Noble Female Clothes[/url] with credit to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23027//?] Neogunbuster[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/412558] Karmoths textures[/url].

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/853158/?]Reaper9111[/url] For the brand new Bodyslide armour! [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16138/?]Nord Hunters Armor[/url] CB++ work By ChronoTrigger77

Aradia for their Aradia Lace, not on the nexus.

Of course, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3330686] Caliente[/url] for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url].And alongside stuffed bunny for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731]Bodyslide [/url]itself, who created the awesome extra sliders. /bow down.

And a personal thank you to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2442809/?]ChronoTrigger77[/url] now co-author of Bamm, he's really accelerated its development, taught me a lot, been gracious and generous, and Just made Bamm an infinitely better mod for you, the BodySlide community. Thanks man.

Also of note is [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3927465/?]bubinga64[/url] who quietly took the .esp and cleaned it up to great effect. Thank you

P.S Thank you to [color=green]Muscle Madam[/color], you un-findable Japanese(?) legend, who originally converted many of these authors works to the CB++ system.


[u][b][size=5pt]Permissions.[/size][/b][/u]
[color=red]Are you an author? [/color] Is your work here against your will ? PLEASE contact us, and we'll remove it very hastily! Hardly go 24 hours without checking, and do not want to P anyone off, just wished to spread this great tool, and fabulous armours further into the community!

[color=red]Are you an author? [/color] And you've not been credited? Again contact us and we'll correct Bamms description ASAP! Sorry If this applies to you! It's often difficult to ascertain exactly where permissions lie, but strenuous efforts have been made.

For anyone looking to work on this file, We're unable give you permission to do ANYTHING with the armours - contact the original authors. But If anyone can translate this, or package it for Bain, anything like that; you don't need to ask. Likewise if you want to ADD to it, and have permissions, by all means go right ahead. Some authors have requested it not be uploaded to Steam.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/z8Qnucm.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/u9sqG5E.png[/img]

[size=5][color=red]BAMM[/color] - BodySlide Armour Merge Mod.[/size]
Originally Bamm was just my (dwjlien) personal merge of all the BodySlide armours I could find across the net, merged into 1 single .esp for easy management. I decided to release it as I thought others would benefit from this convenience. Since then ChronoTrigger77 has added his considerable expertise to really transform Bamm into a professionally executed mod that is every Bodyslide users dream, and a fantastic reason for any none user to convert.
Bamm's CB++ work and settings were all crafted by the talented Chrono Trigger 77, custom done for Bamm.
Very importantly, [b]NONE[/b] of these armours are my creations, or my work. All credit should go to the original authors [url=http://cityadspix.com/tsclick-MIQCWPUV-GECAQBFF?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sotmarket.ru%2Fproduct%2Fpartner-night.html&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&bt=20&pt=9<=2&tl=3&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&im=ODI1LTAtMTQzMDA5ODk4OS0xNjQ4ODI0Ng%3D%3D&fid=NDQ1NzU2Nzc1&prdct=093d0d390d37033502&kw=of%20the]of the[/url] armours.

BAMM is only a thing due to their creativity and hard work, please endorse them.

Bamms intention is to provide a convenient one stop shop of the 1st 50 available Bodyslide armours  on the net. Amazing, thanks to all the authors who gave their permission.
Bamm does not include CB++ conversions of Vanilla or DLC armours, Bamms are all none Bethesda produced works. Look at [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259/]ChronoTrigger77[/url]'s skimpy collection or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12273]Caliente's [/url]vanilla BS collection for that. Alternatively [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654/?]KK's W-I-P[/url] also has Bodyslide options.

All the armours within Bamm have been updated to match stuffed Bunny's improved 35 Slider CB++. You won't find some of these settings anywhere else! All the armours are neatly categorised with in CB++ for easy access and manipulation.
Great time has also been spent to provide you the user with as much choice as possible. Not only is every Bodyslide armour in here, but many have been expanded into Heavy, Light and even Cloth crafting options, so your play-style is hopefully not restricted by your look.
All recipes are neatly organised at the tanning rack to diminish confusion and forge bloat, and all armours are fully temperable at a workbench as normal.

Bodyslide itself is Caliente's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731]amazing tool.[/url] Further expanded upon [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731/?] here.[/url] CB++ allows for full customisation of your female body, to whatever proportions you want. Really thin legs? Massive thighs? Huge breasts? Wide shoulders? Tiny nipples? Huge belly? All possible and any combination there of. You can create a body that will take on these proportions when ever a character or NPC is nude, or wearing a Bamm or BodySlide armour.
Importantly, you can also create individual configurations for any armours that are BodySlide enabled.
These armours can match your body settings, so that you look the same nude, or attired. No more magically shrinking boobs or expanding assess, I find this really adds to the immersion.
Additionally you can make some armours really fat, or thin, top heavy or anything, to create a large amount of variety in the way NPC's look in Skyrim. As much as BodySlide is a tool for sexy ladies- I find it invaluable for [color=green]immersion[/color] - some people are fat!

BodySlide is an amazing gift to the Skyrim community, I urge you try it - it even comes with the option to create your body to be like UNP etc, theoretically making every armour in the game and in mods compatible!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/z8Qnucm.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/dMl53Sa.png[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/z8Qnucm.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/ipfzRpC.png[/img]

[color=yellow]Q: Can you make [i]"this"[/i] armour Bodyslide enabled?[/color]
A: NO! dwjlien has no skill or abilities. I've created none of this. [color=red]Requests are pointless.[/color]

[color=yellow]Q: Is Bamm compatible with "[i]this[/i]" mod?[/color]
A: Yes.
Always yes. Bamm won't break your game, or any other mods. Nor should removing it.
It may not WORK with UNP body types etc, but someone else will have to test that.

[color=yellow]Q: What armours are in this pack?[/color]
A: The following, numbered to match the pics you find in the images section.
Check [url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0ApOvS0m_BRJ4dGdNb0VzLUxCR0RpVTBEdzNCbndHRnc#gid=0]Bamm Armours[/url] for an up to date reference [url=http://cityadspix.com/tsclick-MIQCWPUV-GECAQBFF?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sotmarket.ru%2Fproduct%2Fpartner-night.html&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&bt=20&pt=9<=2&tl=3&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&im=ODI1LTAtMTQzMDA5ODk4OS0xNDUyODYzOA%3D%3D&fid=NDQ1NzU2Nzc1&prdct=093d0d390d37033502&kw=of%20the]of the[/url] armours included in Bamm, Bodyslide notes and any other specific details.

[color=yellow]Q: How do I get these armours?[/color]
A: At the[color=red] tanning rack,[/color] see [color=green]BAMM Armours.xls[/color] for perk requirements.
All Cloth is under Studded, Light Under Imperial, and Heavy under Orcish.

[color=yellow]Q: Will these armours be in leveled lists?[/color]
A: dwjlien doesn't know how to do that, but is working on learning. Be ages but will happen as a separate .esp option eventually.

[color=yellow][i]Q: "This"[/i] armours bodyslide settings are messed up and display wrong in game.[/color]
A: Have you got the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731/?]very latest CB++ Sliders[/url] Hopefully that will address any issues, if not leave a comment.

[color=yellow]Q: Will you update this?[/color]
A: Periodically as new BS armours are released.

[color=yellow]Q: Did you know [i]"this"[/i] was wrong with your mod?[/color]
A : No, dwjlien is an unskilled idiot. We wouldn't deliberately put out a broke mod. Please alert us to any problems, even send a 'fix' to me, and we'll update BAMM promptly.

[color=yellow]Q: How do I change the body shape?[/color]
A: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\CalienteTools\BodySlide Open up the bodyslide++.exe.
At group filter, choose CB++ Bodies. In there at Sliderset Scroll to CB++ Body+BPP. Then at preset choose a shape you like, or customise one with the sliders. Press Build to place the body in game.
Refer to the [url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0ApOvS0m_BRJ4dGdNb0VzLUxCR0RpVTBEdzNCbndHRnc#gid=0]Google Doc[/url] For each armours Group slider that you'd alter in the same way as above.
Please refer to the BodySlide mods own pages for in-depth instructions.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/z8Qnucm.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/b46tj9R.png[/img]

I recommend you endorse each author! Downloading them will give you a handy back up as well.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259/]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and BBP[/url] by ChronoTrigger77
Truly amazing work from a very talented guy. Get it, love it, endorse him. Makes all the official armours BodySlide enabled!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12273] Calientes Vanilla Outfits for CBBE [/url] Calientes own Bodyslide enabled vanilla armours, much less skimpy than Chrono Triggers.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/z8Qnucm.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/pke6TsQ.png[/img]

[size=5pt][u]Bugs & Issues[/u][/size]
Spriggan Armour disappears at 100 weight. So set it lower. In console - player.setnpcweight 99 - is as close as possible.
Castuit Armour. Does not work well with BPP. May Remove on Feeback.
LSAR undergarments are very clipping prone, especially [url=http://cityadspix.com/tsclick-MIQCWPUV-GECAQBFF?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sotmarket.ru%2Fproduct%2Fbosch-gbh-2-26-dre-set-0611253768.html&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&bt=20&pt=9<=2&tl=3&sa=1559&sa2=mh-ts&sa3=&sa4=&sa5=&im=ODI1LTAtMTQzMDA5ODk4OS0xMTA3ODEwMg%3D%3D&fid=NDQ1NzU2Nzc1&prdct=3f0f36083f0f&kw=set%202]set 2[/url], hips. EliteCheat has sadly got real life issues, but has allowed ANYONE capable of fixing it to do so if they wish.
Armours can have clipping at extreme weights. Some just will. Some it's due to being created under the old 10 slide version Bodyslide, where as Bodyslide now has 35 sliders.
Some armours have clipping at extreme weight slider settings, this is inevitable when you push to ridiculous extremes! It's a great program but can only work with Skyrims armours limitations.

[u][size=5pt]To Do list[/size][/u]
Integrate into leveled lists.

[u][size=5pt]Version History & Updates.[/size][/u]
[u]1.0[/u]
Original Release.

[u]1.1[/u]
[color=red]New Armours! : [/color]
Viceroy Inquistor, by[color=yellow] Killer Keo. [/color]
Nordic Chainmail See-through by [color=yellow]themanclaw,[/color] plus Lace variants. And A Leather retexture equivalent. 4 Different looks!
LSAR Undgarments [color=yellow] by EliteCheat [/color] 4 Unique Bodyslide enable underwear sets.
[color=red]New Feature! : [/color]
Every BAMM added armour now has ' ++ ' added to its in-game name. Simply type in console [color=green]help "++"[/color] (MUST include quotation marks) to list every BAMM added armour. Helpful.
[color=red]Bug Fix : [/color]
Thanks to Anime_Otaku102 who alerted me to fact that Bamm v1.0 had been mistakenly packaged with a load of unnecessary weapon textures. These have been removed from current all Bamm releases after v1.1.
Divine Huntress and Spriggan armour should now be FULLY Bodyslide enabled, thank you marcheluis.
Fixed Crafting and Temper recipes for Viceroy Inquisitors Robe. Fur Huntress Hood up now displays!

[u]OVERHAUL UPDATE[/u] 1.2 - Completely uninstall all old versions and updates, then install 1.2
Major .esp edits by dwjlien
Major files overhaul by ChronoTrigger77
Add Noble Clothes by Merilia (CB++ sliders completely redone by CT77)
Added Missing Nipple Piercings Set by EliteCheat
Fix Gatti Yomiko mis-aligned in bodyslide
Files cleaned up - removed about 65MB of un-needed material from final 7z file.
Groups, Slider Sets and Presets fixed and consolidated for easier use in bodyslide.
Regenerated Default Meshes
Added CB++ versions of Lustriana's oufits, Caliente's 2 Tera Armors and Nordic Chainmail
As of 1.2, you MUST FIRST INSTALL [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731]Bodyslide CB Plus Plus (Main files)[/url]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/W53mLby.png[/img][/center]
Version 1.3.1
[color=red]Fixes : [/color]
Fix - missing bodyslide files for Nordic Hunter Panty in 1.3
Fixed Nordic Chainmail Seethrough & leather display.
Adjusted breast armor on Sovngarde steel (removed extra space)
Optimized textures to reduce archive size.
[color=red]New Additions: [/color]

Added Reaper9111's CBB Nord Hunter
Added Frozzled SilverNight Armour retexture
Added CBBE/BPP Bodyslide 3D Pubic hair by EliteCheat
[color=red]New Features: [/color]
Light Armours All affixed (L)++
Heavy Armours All affixed (H)++
All crafting moved to the Tanning Rack. Cloth under Studded. Light Under Imperial, Heavy Under Orcish. Weapons etc under Steel.
CB++ Presets have been massively cleaned up, and Bamm Armours categorised into sections for easy and elegant BodSlide manipulation within the BodySlide++.exe.
[url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0ApOvS0m_BRJ4dGdNb0VzLUxCR0RpVTBEdzNCbndHRnc#gid=0]Bamm Armour Google Doc[/url] Viewable, listing all armours and specfic notes.
author: dwjlien and ChronoTrigger77
